body:
thanks! There seems to be a new update for tensorflow. Is the new update
fixed for python3?

On Mon, Jan 8, 2018 at 1:56 AM, nrocketmann <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Glad I found this issue. Having the same problem. Will definitely use
> python2.7 for LSTM now. Really hope you can fix this! Thanks!
